text: Ani yahudi va khriscana tumacyasi kadhihi khusa honara nahita, joparyanta tumhi tyancya dharmace anusarana na karala. (Tumhi) sanga ki allahace margadarsanaca, margadarsana asate ani jara tumhi, apalyajavala jnana ghe'una pohocalyanantarahi tyancya iccha abhilasance anusarana kele tara allahacya javala tumaca na koni samarthaka asela, na koni sahayyaka
